conbody.p:
In Design Studio, an event represents JavaScript events occurring on a widget. Events are used for navigation through the Web application. An event triggers a series of actions on certain user action, such as click, field update, or tabulation. It is possible to define events on many widgets.
Simplified event Lets you define a standard hyperlink or a standard submit event.
Advanced event Gives you access to all supported event types, functions and their attributes. If you need to use the Advanced Event, see information about event-driven action tags in Triple'A Plus Advanced Customisation Guide for details of the events and actions.
Search event Provides integrated setting of parameters to be submitted to search service at runtime. To be used when the event calls an URI loading a search page.
Filter set Submits filters to apply on a dataset. For instance, from a summary view, a hyperlink on portfolio code filters detailed view.
